official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to release restrictions on the use of certain property conveyed to the city of Gary, Indiana, for airport purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to grant releases with respect to certain property conveyed by the United States to the city of Gary, Indiana, for airport purposes.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to release restrictions on the use of certain property conveyed to the city of Gary, Indiana, for airport purposes.
